sentences.en: ...a Roman villa which once housed a fine collection of mosaics.
sentences.cn: …一座曾藏有一批精美的马赛克收藏品的罗马别墅。

sentences.en: A novel optical 3 - D sensing method using sign mosaics is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出一种采用标记拼接的新的光学三维传感方法.

sentences.en: Collins for a little thesis pointing out the inferiority of the original mosaics to their photographs.
sentences.cn: 科林斯写了一篇小论文,指出镶嵌细工的原件不如照片那么好看.

sentences.en: For example: output, tailoring, covered with film, designer of these special panels, mosaics, and so on.
sentences.cn: 例如有: 输入 、 剪裁 、 覆膜 、 裱板 、 拼接等等.

sentences.en: Mosaics from the 2 nd - 6 th century show curtains suspended from rods spanning arches.
sentences.cn: 在古代曾被用来作为室内间隔物.

sentences.en: The famous panels were transported there and were enriched with Florentine mosaics representing the five senses.
sentences.cn: 这些著名的镶板被运到那里,并被饰以描绘五感的佛罗伦萨镶嵌画.

sentences.en: The floors were laid in fanciful figures wrought in mosaics of many - coloured marbles.
sentences.cn: 地上都有五彩云石镶嵌的怪兽异禽.

sentences.en: The panel shows marked similarities with mosaics found elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 这块嵌板和在其他地方找到的镶嵌图案有明显的相似之处.

sentences.en: There the bar, hand - tiled in aqueous mosaics, sits in the dreamlike state a frozen wave.
sentences.cn: 在那,有瓦片镶嵌的手工流体方案, 酒吧就座落在这定型了的波状梦幻境界之中.

sentences.en: They decorated their palaces with glass mosaics ( pictures made by putting together small bits of colored glass ).
sentences.cn: 他们还用玻璃镶嵌图案 ( 把许多彩色小块玻璃拼成图案 ).

sentences.en: They sell materials for DIY mosaics and ready-made panels.
sentences.cn: 他们出售自己动手做镶嵌画所需材料和现成的镶板。

sentences.en: Viruses are often classified into broad categories as mosaics , yellows, mottles, and streaks.
sentences.cn: 病毒病常分为几大类,即花叶病, 黄化病, 斑驳或条斑.

phrases.tran_cn: 玻璃马赛克；玻璃镶嵌砖
马赛克玻璃；五彩玻璃；花玻璃，锦玻璃

trans.tran_cn: 镶嵌细工的；用拼花方式制成的
马赛克( mosaic的名词复数 )，镶嵌，镶嵌工艺，镶嵌图案
trans.tran_en: A mosaic is a design which consists of small pieces of coloured glass, pottery, or stone set in concrete or plaster
